_header: He is quick that seemeth dead
_description: The mystery of the Incarnation — two quatrains

CopenThott110.First Lines:
he ys quycke that semyth dedeAnd also fleesh that semyth
                    brede…
CopenThott110.Last Lines:
…lett be thy Reason lett be thy WondyreFor feythe ys above and
                    Reason ys Vndr
CopenThott110.Editions:
Bradley,  S. A. J. 
             “An Incompletely Noted Variant of the Middle English Lyric ‘Faith
                is Above Reason’ (Index 4181).” 
             Notes and Queries
         n.s. 22 [220] (1975): 341-3: 342.
